Html:
I hesitate to post as I'm assuming it has to be something I've done since no one else has reported this, so I'm hoping at least someone will have seen this behavior and can correct me.

I'm getting "Warning: Invalid argument supplied for foreach() in /home/developer/www/dev/library/PHPExcel/PHPExcel/Reader/Excel2007.php on line 353" when loading xlsx files.  These files loaded just fine before I updated from the repository.

The important lines of code there are:

352: $rels = simplexml_load_string($this->_getFromZipArchive($zip, "_rels/.rels")); //~ http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/package/2006/relationships");
353:        foreach ($rels->Relationship as $rel) {

Which seems to indicate a problem in _getFromZipArchive which when I debug

305: if (strpos($fileName, '//') !== false)

shows that $Filename starts out as "_rels/.rels"

and then on line:

309: $fileName = PHPExcel_Shared_File::realpath($fileName);

suddenly changes to include a system file path: "/home/developer/www/dev/public/_rels/.rels"

Is this a setting problem...or possibly a bug?

Any ideas?

Commenting out the call to realpath on line 78 in PHPExcel/Shared/File.php fixed the problem.

78:   //$returnValue = realpath($pFilename);

Copied to a work item:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=11488

Do you perhaps have a example file you can upload at that issue?

Hy, I got the same problem on a centos box , i've also tested on a debian box but it works fine.
